an8.43:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati pubbarame migaramatupasade.
an8.43:1.2: Atha kho visakha migaramata yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho visakham migaramataram bhagava etadavoca:
an8.43:1.3: “atthangasamannagato kho, visakhe, uposatho upavuttho mahapphalo hoti mahanisamso mahajutiko mahavippharo.
an8.43:1.4: Katham upavuttho ca, visakhe, atthangasamannagato uposatho mahapphalo hoti mahanisamso mahajutiko mahavippharo?
an8.43:1.6: ‘yavajivam arahanto panatipatam pahaya panatipata pativirata nihitadanda nihitasattha lajji dayapanna, sabbapanabhutahitanukampino viharanti.
an8.43:1.7: Ahampajja imanca rattim imanca divasam panatipatam pahaya panatipata pativirato nihitadando nihitasattho lajji dayapanno, sabbapanabhutahitanukampi viharami.
an8.43:1.8: Iminapangena arahatam anukaromi, uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissati’ti.
an8.43:2.1: ‘Yavajivam arahanto uccasayanamahasayanam pahaya uccasayanamahasayana pativirata nicaseyyam kappenti—mancake va tinasantharake va.
an8.43:2.2: Ahampajja imanca rattim imanca divasam uccasayanamahasayanam pahaya uccasayanamahasayana pativirato nicaseyyam kappemi—mancake va tinasantharake va.
an8.43:2.3: Iminapangena arahatam anukaromi, uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissati’ti.
an8.43:2.5: Evam upavuttho kho, visakhe, atthangasamannagato uposatho mahapphalo hoti mahanisamso mahajutiko mahavippharo.
an8.43:3.2: Seyyathapi, visakhe, yo imesam solasannam mahajanapadanam pahutarattaratananam issariyadhipaccam rajjam kareyya, seyyathidam—
an8.43:3.3: anganam magadhanam kasinam kosalanam vajjinam mallanam cetinam vanganam kurunam pancalanam macchanam surasenanam assakanam avantinam gandharanam kambojanam, atthangasamannagatassa uposathassa etam kalam nagghati solasim.
an8.43:3.5: Kapanam, visakhe, manusakam rajjam dibbam sukham upanidhaya.
an8.43:4.1: Yani, visakhe, manusakani pannasa vassani, catumaharajikanam devanam eso eko rattindivo.
an8.43:4.4: Tena samvaccharena dibbani panca vassasatani catumaharajikanam devanam ayuppamanam.
an8.43:4.5: Thanam kho panetam, visakhe, vijjati yam idhekacco itthi va puriso va atthangasamannagatam uposatham upavasitva kayassa bheda param marana catumaharajikanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjeyya.
an8.43:4.6: Idam kho panetam, visakhe, sandhaya bhasitam:
an8.43:5.1: Yam, visakhe, manusakam vassasatam, tavatimsanam devanam eso eko rattindivo.
an8.43:5.4: Tena samvaccharena vassasahassam tavatimsanam devanam ayuppamanam.
an8.43:5.5: Thanam kho panetam, visakhe, vijjati yam idhekacco itthi va puriso va atthangasamannagatam uposatham upavasitva kayassa bheda param marana tavatimsanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjeyya.
an8.43:5.6: Idam kho panetam, visakhe, sandhaya bhasitam:
an8.43:6.4: solasa vassasatani paranimmitavasavattinam devanam eso eko rattindivo.
an8.43:6.7: Tena samvaccharena dibbani solasa vassasahassani paranimmitavasavattinam devanam ayuppamanam.
an8.43:6.8: Thanam kho panetam, visakhe, vijjati yam idhekacco itthi va puriso va atthangasamannagatam uposatham upavasitva kayassa bheda param marana paranimmitavasavattinam devanam sahabyatam upapajjeyya.
an8.43:6.9: Idam kho panetam, visakhe, sandhaya bhasitam:
an8.43:7.2: Musa na bhase na ca majjapo siya;
an8.43:8.1: Malam na dhare na ca gandhamacare,
an8.43:9.1: Cando ca suriyo ca ubho sudassana,
an8.43:12.1: Tasma hi nari ca naro ca silava,
